title: Condo for Rent in Quiet Community
posting_body: Available in September
2 bedroom, 1 bathroom, Carriage House end unit with balcony in well located building with private entrance and garage.
Located on the 2nd floor; inside staircase to enter
1-car attached garage
ft.
Renovated bathroom (2021) - modern fixtures, shower stall with porcelain patterned tile, double-sink vanity with integrated power outlet for hair dryer and device charging station.
Updated kitchen (2021) - off-white cabinets, white-wash wood ceiling, new quartz countertop (Expo Grey) and large double sink and marble backsplash in herringbone pattern.
New carpet throughout (2021)
New sliding door to balcony and new windows throughout (2021)
This unit is in the back of the condo complex and faces a quiet subdivision
Very private
Enjoy your coffee or dinner on the updated balcony
Views of the sunrise and sunset from the wooded, arborvitae-lined grounds
Unit includes - living room, kitchen, dining area, 2 bedrooms, full bath & laundry room.
Garage and balcony + a little green space with an easy to manage garden; hostas, hydrangeas, salvia, daylilies and ferns.
Included: refrigerator, stove, dishwasher and washer & dryer.
Newer gas furnace with A/C and water heater.
Walkable neighborhoods with easy access to I-94.
Shops, grocery stores and restaurants nearby.
with water included.
1.5 month security deposit ($2025).
Available in September, please make an appointment for a showing.
Looking for a considerate and quiet tenant who will appreciate the space we have created.
No pets, smoking, vaping or drugs allowed (this is non-negotiable).

Must have enough computer knowledge to fill in and return the application (fillable PDF), follow the link to fill in credit check/background check (SmartMove by Experian), set up monthly rent payments using an on-line source (PayPal, Venmo, Zelle) and respond to our emails and/or texts (communicate) in a timely manner.
